Reviews.Title: Many drawbacks - not much good
Reviews.Author: Larry Reed
Reviews.Content: I'm extremely disappointed with this camera.pic transfer to my Galaxy S3 and Galaxy S4 are not good.  Still have not been able to make it work reliably using any of the various methods.Slow to take pictures - auto-focus is really slow.It feels cheap.The telephoto lens that came with it is almost useless.Do yourself a favor and buy a good point and shoot camera with optical zoom.

Reviews.Title: Best birthday gift ever!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Hanes "EvelynHarlot"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my boyfriends birthday, he's been looking at camera's for months now and he loves Samsung products. This is def a winner. Of course this means I now hold the title of best birthday gift in our relationship.Bundle arrived as described, camera works beautifully. He's already extremely happy with all the extra's and I am happy I went with this bundle instead of just getting the camera. Perfect for a starting out photographer.
